title: Swiggy's staff can get cumulative $50 million under ESOP plan
description: Swiggy, the Indian food and grocery delivery firm, will purchase shares worth over $50m from 2,000 employees in its next employee stock ownership plan. The stock upgrade offers staff from Dineout - which Swiggy purchased last year - a chance to participate.
